## IFeatureExecutionOptions.configName property

configuration file name scoped to feature root directory.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
configName?: string;
```

## Example

given the following structure: --my-feature -- feature -- my-feature.feature.ts -- production.config.ts -- fixtures -- dev.config.ts possible feature names will be: `my-feature/production` `my-feature/dev`
